subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Floyd Mayweather Jr. completed a plea deal that let him pay a $1,000 fine and avoid jail time for a November 2010 scuffle with a homeowner association security guard.
snippet: Lawyers for Floyd Mayweather Jr. completed a plea deal that let him pay a $1,000 fine and avoid jail time for a November 2010 scuffle with a homeowner association security guard.
